title: LinuxAdminToolkit
description: This repository is a comprehensive collection of essential Linux commands, networking configurations, services management, monitoring tools, logging practices, and shell scripting examples.

projects.title: Commands
projects.subTitle: Master essential Linux commands for managing files, processes, users, and system resources.

projects.title: Networking
projects.subTitle: Understand networking concepts, configure IP addresses, and troubleshoot network issues.

projects.title: Monitoring and Logging
projects.subTitle: Explore tools and technologies for monitoring system performance and analyzing logs.

projects.title: Shell Scripting
projects.subTitle: Automate repetitive tasks and improve efficiency with advanced shell scripting techniques.

title: PyCyberSecurity
description: This repository contains a collection of python scripts and projects related to various cybersecurity tasks.

projects.title: File Identification
projects.subTitle: Identify and Detect Embedded File Types Using Magic Numbers

projects.title: Firewall
projects.subTitle: Dynamic Firewall Simulation with Rule-Based Packet Filtering

projects.title: Keylogger
projects.subTitle: Monitor and Log Keystrokes with a Timed Listener

projects.title: System Monitor
projects.subTitle: Monitor Server Performance and Automate Log Emailing

title: InternetBanking
description: This project provides users with a secure and user-friendly platform to manage their bank accounts online.

title: StickWithIt
description: StickWithIt is an online food ordering website created using PHP. You can view and purchase various items as well as remove items from the cart.

title: music-app
description: A simple music web application created using Vue.js with Tailwind CSS. You can play and pause the song and go to the next and previous song or click on the song to play.

title: crud-app
description: A simple crud app using Node.js and Express.js.

title: iNoteBook
description: You can add your note with title, description and tag (optional). You can also edit the note, delete the note whenever you need.
